text: "That's What I Like" is a 2017 song by Bruno Mars and is the second single from his third studio album 24K Magic (2016). It topped the single charts in the United States and made the top 20 in Argentina, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Ireland, Israel, Malaysia, New Zealand, the Philippines, Portugal, South Korea and the United Kingdom. It won 3 Grammy Awards in 2018. == Track listings == == References == Category:2017 songs Category:Bruno Mars songs Category:Hip hop soul songs Category:New jack swing songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Funk songs
title: That's What I Like
